column5: Hello all. I am looking for a little advice. Pike opens this weekend on Georgian Bay. I am located in Barrie... and looking to head out this weekend... Can anyone recommend areas where I can fish from shore for pike? I am located in Barrie.... and will drive up to 1.5 hours. I would really appreciate anyones advice. Thanks!
Pike opened May 1st on G-Bay.  Try Hogg Bay in Midland.

Actually Hoggs bay is between Port McNicol and Victoria Harbour.. but what's a few miles ! LOL  Shore fishing it is tough though.. pretty much limited to casting from the old Grain Elevator yard in Port. Into Port...go right to the end of the street. Street goes left and Elevator Harbour is on the right. Not sure how much access there is anymore though.. Lock your car twice!
Penetanguishene! Right on the town docks and the boat launch ramp area all along the shore ! Good luck!
Thanks for the great information! I am going to check out all of those places. I will post tomorrow to let you know how I made out.
